scripts.install: find tasks -name tsconfig.json ! -path '*/node_modules/*' -print0 | xargs -0 -I {} sh -c 'cd $(dirname {}) && npm install'
scripts.build: npm run compile:tasks && npm run package:tasks
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run initdev && npm run build
scripts.package:tasks: tfx extension create --trace-level debug --root . --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json
scripts.package: npm run build:clean && npm run package:tasks
